sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-terms-page', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule], template: `

Terms of Service

Last updated: 2021-10-20

Introduction

Overview of the services provided by Bauhaus Research, including web development, app development, and design.

Client Access and Account

Description of the client application and access to the platform after a demo call. Client responsibilities regarding the proper use of the platform and adherence to terms and conditions.

Communication and Project Updates

Importance of maintaining regular communication with the agency for timely project completion. Explanation that failure to stay in contact may result in project delays and potential breach of contract.

Payments and Refunds

Non-refundable policy for services provided by Bauhaus Research. Description of payment terms, methods, and invoicing procedures.

Intellectual Property

Recognition that intellectual property rights are discussed and governed on a case-by-case basis. Agreement that any usage or licensing of intellectual property will be specified in separate contracts.

Data Collection and Privacy

Types of personal information collected, such as first and last name, email, business name, and phone number. Assurance of responsible data handling and compliance with applicable data protection laws.

Termination

Conditions under which either party can terminate the agreement. Explanation that termination may result in the client being responsible for a portion of the total contract value.

Limitation of Liability

Disclaimer of warranties and limitations of liability for damages resulting from the use of services.

Governing Law and Jurisdiction

Choice of governing law and jurisdiction for resolving disputes.

Miscellaneous

Severability clause to ensure that if any provision is found invalid, it will not affect the enforceability of the remaining provisions. Entire agreement clause stating that the Terms of Service constitute the entire agreement between the parties.

`, styles: [ ] }) export class TermsPageComponent { }
